chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: This document describes most of the Python ConIC version 0.1 classes and their methods and associated functions. This document attempts to document as much of the Python ConIC API as possible but there are undoubtedly errors and omissions. If you discover any of these please file a bug report at the PyMaemo bugzilla.

sect1.title: Reference Page Format
sect1.para: This document follows PyGTK documentation format.
